profile.title: Software Engineer

profile.aboutText: I'm a software engineer with a broad experience living in Barcelona, Spain.
profile.aboutme: Currently working on web and mobile applications with technologies like JavaScript, Angular and React. I have also worked on freelance projects and companies, giving me a broad and adaptable view of the development process.

experience.fullStackDescription: Developed and maintained multiple web applications with modern JavaScript frameworks.
experience.frontendDescription: Created responsive web interfaces and improved user experience across various projects.
